column2: There are so many doors here.
column3: I wonder where they all lead.*yes

column1: So this is the Throne Room?
column3: Who really needs a chair that big anyway?

column2: Look at all these strange objects.
column3: I’m sure they could spare one little thing.*yes

column2: Look at all these nasty looking objects!
column3: On the other hand, they COULD come in handy someday.
column4: I’m sure they wouldn’t mind a little involuntary charity.*yes
I’m sure they wouldn’t miss just a few coins.*yes

column1: Just as you are making your way out with your ill-gotten loot a guard spots you!
column2: You soon meet the business end of his sword.*yes
